SunlitPath apps for learning, focus, and life direction

A personal project building web and mobile apps for education, productivity, and wellbeing ‚Äî designed to help people build habits, gain clarity, and turn goals into reality.

Our Vision

Four pillars guiding everything we build

Learn Skills

Bite-sized practice for Japanese, math, typing, and coding basics ‚Äî designed for steady daily progress.

Build Momentum

Simple productivity systems for focus, habits, and execution that make progress sustainable.

Strengthen Wellbeing

Practical tools supporting routine awareness through calm, movement, and consistency.

Find Direction

Clear vision and small steps to turn goals and long-term aspirations into reality.

Our North Star

"Like the Sun, illuminating and energizing all existence ‚Äî spreading smiles and happiness to every being and beyond."

About the Project

Building practical tools for learning and growth

Project started

2025

Created by

Yo Fujimoto

Based in

Tokyo

SunlitPath is an early-stage personal project building a suite of apps that help people learn, stay focused, and support their wellbeing ‚Äî while also creating clarity about goals and direction. Coding education has been explored through hands-on pilot workshops using Scratch and Python.

Global Perspective

Our Apps

Three categories of tools designed to support learning, focus, and daily wellbeing

Education

  • Japanese learning (lessons + practice)
  • Math practice (daily drills)
  • Typing practice (speed + accuracy)
  • Coding basics (Scratch, Python) ‚Äî pilot workshops

Productivity & Focus

  • Focus-first routines and habit systems
  • Planning tools for clear vision and goals
  • Actionable steps for long-term growth

Wellbeing & Reflection

  • Meditation and calm training tools
  • Simple movement and fitness routines
  • Daily practices that support balance and energy

These tools are intended for general wellbeing and self-reflection and do not replace professional medical or psychological care.
